backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing per-user diary entries (date, mood, reflection) stored in a Map by Principal, and providing 20 motivational messages with query endpoints for retrieval and entry management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the CEO attribution footer feature (Matheus Gama) in Layout.tsx with high confidence, linked to test REQ-14.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 13 frontend files covering styling, routing, pages (welcome, home, breathing, diary), components (forms, lists, cards), and custom hooks for queries and breathing timer logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining design tokens for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, Calma-Mente title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining root layout and four routes (/, /home, /breathing, /diary) with corresponding page components wrapped in Layout.
frontend/src/components/DiaryEntryForm.t: Form component with mood selector (8 options with emojis) and reflection textarea that submits diary entries via useAddDiaryEntry mutation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/DiaryEntryList.t: Scrollable list displaying user diary entries in reverse chronological order with mood emojis, formatted timestamps, and reflection text, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout with header (logo, auth controls), background overlay, main content area, and footer featuring Android download button, CEO attribution (Matheus Gama), and caffeine.ai credit.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalMess: Card component displaying motivational message with sparkle icon and refresh button, featuring gradient background and loading state support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and caching backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingTimer.ts: Custom React hook that manages a breathing exercise timer with three phases (inhale, hold, exhale) of 4 seconds each, providing start/pause/reset controls and cycle counting.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching diary entries, adding new entries, and retrieving motivational messages from the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a calming sage green and lavender color palette, plus keyframe animations for breathing exercise visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BreathingExercisePage: Breathing exercise page with animated visual guidance through inhale/hold/exhale cycles, displaying motivational messages after each completed cycle with auto-hide functionality.
frontend/src/pages/DiaryPage.tsx: Diary page requiring Internet Identity authentication, displaying a login prompt for unauthenticated users or a two-column layout with entry form and entry list for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying a random motivational message with refresh capability and two feature cards linking to breathing exercises and mindfulness diary sections.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Welcome/landing page component that displays the Calma-Mente logo, introduction text, and three navigation cards (Home, Breathing, Diary) with a 'Begin Your Journey' button.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, custom fonts (Inter), box shadows, border radius variables, and keyframe animations for accordions and fade-in effects.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking 11 implemented features including welcome screen, breathing exercises, diary with mood tracking, Internet Identity authentication, motivational messages, and Android download functionality.
